headline: Charter upgraded to Peer Perform from Underperform at Wolfe Research
summary: Wolfe Research upgraded Charter (CHTR) to Peer Perform from Underperform without a price target President Trump’s “Big Beautiful Bill” seems likely to reinstate 100% bonus depreciation, the analyst tells investors in a research note. Wolfe estimates the five major connectivity providers could cumulatively gain $10.5B of cash tax relief in 2025 alone . Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. Try Now>> See today’s best-performing stocks
